webwork-tex.statement: If \(\mathbf{a} = \mathbf{i} + \mathbf{j} + 5 \mathbf{k}\) and \(\mathbf{b} = \mathbf{i} + \mathbf{j} + 5 \mathbf{k}\) \leavevmode\\\relax Compute the cross product \(\bf{a} \times \bf{b}\). \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax \(\bf{a} \times \bf{b}=\)\mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\bf{i}\) + \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\bf{j}\) + \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\bf{k}\)
